item.title: About
item.description: This site features articles and tutorials to help spiritually minded folk understand technology. About the Author My name is Wendy Closson. In 1998, I was a programming geek who loved weight lifting, anime, and video games. In 2008, I became a mom – that was really hard! In 2009, I was diagnosed with a rare cancer – that was much worse! After a year of experimental treatment, I was physically, emotionally, and mentally broken.
